conversations.content: *sigh* Kitty is SO cute...
Wait, am I getting mushy? Is this mush? What's even HAPPENING to me right now?
Augh! I've never felt like this before! I just wanna pick her up and give her big squishy hugs and pets on her little squishy head!
Nya? Is that fresh meat I smell?!
Aww, she's even adorable when she's running away from me very, very quickly!
But WHY am I so hung up on this Felyne?
My goal has always been to seek out powerful warriors in the hopes of one day knowing what defeat is like.
That stayed the case even after Elisanne handed me my very first loss.
Focus, Vanessa... Focus on losing... Focus on the thrill of combat...
Aaaaugh! I can't do it! My stupid brain is crammed full of thoughts about kitty!
Oh kiiiitty... I wanna be with yoooou... Wanna pet your fur and do do de dooo...
The Felyne in question is a Lynian from another world. The human, Vanessa, has been utterly entranced by her, and now spends her days creeping about in pursuit of the furry creature.
*stare*
Nya! What's a banana peel doing here?!
Oh no, kitty! I should go help her! ...Er, but what do I say?
Whew! I was in trouble there for a second...
Blargh! She's gone!
Hrmm... That bookshelf is just out of my reach...
Right! This time, I'll help her for sure! ...Gah! Too...nervous! Feet...won't move!
You trying to reach this book? Here you go.
You're a purr-fect lifesaver! Thanks!
Too late! Again. Blaaargh.
Mrow? Oh, I'm very curious about this.
Okay, this time I'll do it for SURE! Come on, body! Move! Move your stupid joints and...just...go...over...
Yes, you are VERY curious indeed, nya.
Bwaaah! Sh-she knows I'm here!
What's going on nyow?
*pant* *heave* *wheeze* S-sorry, kitty. My heart started pounding like nobody's business there for a second.
Is it paw-sible you're sick or something, nya?
Sick? I dunno. Maybe? I guess I could be? Basically, my heart starts doing the tango whenever I look at you.
It's like I want to be with you all the time. It's a feeling and it's WEIRD!
I see.
You understand my feelings?!
Sure. You want me to be your Palico and go on hunts with you.
What?
Makes sense. You've gotten comfortable with your Kirin gear, so nyow all that's left is furr you to get a Palico.
Oh! Uh...
And while I'm honored that you'd tap me for the position...there's a purr-oblem.
See, I already have a meowster, and it's bad form for a Palico to try and work with two different hunters.
Oh. I...see.
But I'd be happy to help you out with stuff OTHER than that! You just meow the word, I'll do it! ...Er, if I can, that is.
What?!
(Anything?! ANYTHING?! Oh geez, what do I ask for?!)
(I'm not looking to test my strength against her, and I hadn't even thought about Palicoes... Oh, no! I haven't thought about what I really want to do at all!)
(Think, Vanessa. THINK! What should you do with kitty? What? Whaaaaat?!)
Ah! Got it!
Nya?
I want you to be with me!
Maybe I wasn't 100 purr-cent clear. I already have someone.
Yeah, I know. Which is why I don't want you to be my Palico or whatever it is. I just want you to be my...friend.
...Mrowr?
I've never had someone just want to be fur-iends before—and especially not someone who's so EARNEST about it!
This is new, but...sure! Why not? Let's be fur-iends.
Aaaaaugh! My heart's gonna POP!
But yay! Yay for us, kitty! We're gonna be the bestest friends EVER!
Huh. So you go out to hunt monsters, gather materials from them, build new gear, then take on even HARDER ones. Sort of the ol' hunter grind, yeah?
You betcha! So is that why you're here? Come to claim new and better gear?
Yeah...and what I want is going to take a good deal of materials...
Thanks for telling me how this hunting stuff works. I'm off to give it a try! Byeeee!
Wow. She practically left a smoke trail behind her when she ran outta here.
I'm back with your documents, nya! ...Er, is there a purr-oblem?
You know that new friend of yours? She just took off for the Hoary Woods like her rear end was on fire.
Without a Palico? Is she crazy?!
I've gotta go after her right nyow!
Oh. She ran off, too. Birds of a feather, I suppose?
*wheeze* I'm not built for long distance purr-suit like this...but I finally made it to the Hoary Woods.
Nyow then...where's Vanessa?
Okay, I see a ton of targets. Probably have to take 'em all down if I want to secure all the materials I need, though...
Those are the dangerous native species the researcher mentioned! Oh, this is clawful! She'll never be able to take them all on at one time!
Hraaaaaagh!
Roooooooar!
Eeeeeep!
No! Th-they got her!
I've got to get her back to base before it's too late!
Okay, finally got her on the cart. Nyow back to the castle!
Ngh? Wh-where am I? What's... Kitty? Is that you? Is this real?
Real as rain, mrowr! I carted you back here after you were defeated.
Oh geez, how embarrassing. So much for making a good impression on you.
Helping each other is what fur-iends do! That's what makes the hunt go on.
Still, why would you run off to the Hoary Woods all alone? I know you're strong, but you could have been turned into tunafish!
Because...um...gear...?
Sorry, what? You're mumbling.
I wanted us to wear matching gear!
Meow's that?
The Kirin stuff I'm wearing doesn't exist in my world, though, so I was trying to gather enough materials to make two sets of matching gear.
But I ended up being carted back like a lame-o and didn't even get enough for ONE set!
You were gonna give me gear? But why? I'm nyot even your Palico.
No, but we ARE friends—and who wouldn't want to give the best gifts to a friend?
Mee-YOW! Good thing I've got all this fur so you can't see how hard I'm blushing.
It's a purr-fectly happy thought, Vanessa. Thank you, nya!
Aaaugh! You jumped into my lap! This makes all my hard work worth it!
...Wait. No, it doesn't! I can't give up now! I am one hundred percent going to get us matching gear as a sign of our friendship!
I'll go to the Hoary Woods as many times as it takes to get all the materials, so don't try and stop me!
Oh dear. Those woods are so dangerous. What can I paw-sibly do...?
Ha ha! I know EXACTLY what to do! Also, for the record, not spying on your little chat—I just happen to have exceptional hearing.
Anyway, I've got a bang-up idea to solve both your problems. Leggo!
Aaand here we are! These are the scraps left over from when I made the Kirin gear that Vanessa's wearing right now.
Scraps?
That's right, they're left over when gear is made for a hunter. It's what gear for us Felynes is made from!
Wait, is that how it works? I had no idea!
Felynes are small, after all! We've got more than enough here to put your matching-fashion plan into action!
I gotta find a smithing expert. Sit tight.
Why are you being so nice to me?!
'Cause you and my furry buddy are friends! A little work is a small price to pay to help foster a growing bond.
Later...
How's it look, nya?
Cute...
Really?!
CUUUUTE!
I think she may need a few minutes.
That's nice, although I don't quite get why she always has so much purr-aise for me?
Aw, that's easy! See, it's just that... No! It would be the height of poor taste for me to speak of it further!
Figuring out the answer to that question is the true pleasure of friendship, so don't give up!
Kiiiitty... Can I...can I give you a big squishy hug?
A-are you okay, mrowr? Your face is really red! Do you need a doctor?
We're back, and we've got a meow-tric ton of stuff with us!
The two of us are making great progress!
*purr* It feels so nice when you pet me like that...
Seems like you two are getting along just swimmingly. Perhaps it is on account of your matching gear sets.
It doesn't hurt, that's for sure. When we hit the trail in these duds, it makes me shivery all over!
Wonderful. And given your impressive teamwork, I've a request for you both.
I've heard tell of a strange fiend roaming these parts lately, and I'd like you to find out the story.
That does sound like it's worth investigating. It could be something really fur-ocious!
No worries, specs! Me and kitty here will have this sorted in a jiff!
I await your news with bated breath.
So according to the researcher's nyotes, the area around here is suspect.
Yeah, it's giving me the heebie-jeebies for sure. Still, I'm not afraid of some dumb fiend! Come on out, you!
GRAAAGH!
Nya! I'd say you successfully purr-voked it!
Keep your blade sharp and let's do this!
Aye-aye, furr-iend!
Hrah!
Gwaaah!
Oh wow, this thing is tough.
If it's this tough even for me... Kitty! Hey! Watch out!
Urgraaah!
Nyaaaaaa!
Watch out, buddy! ...Hrrrk!
Graaaagh!
Ungh!
Vanessa! You got hurt purr-tecting me!
Talk later... Right now...I have to be... your shield! Hraaaaagh!
No! I can't ask you to get hurt for my sake. I'll be fine!
After all, what kind of Palico would I be if I let you do everything!
I'm not that great at working in tandem, but okay! Let's try!
I'll take care of the tail while you handle the horns!
Go after the horns alone? I've never taken on such an impurr-tant role...
(I'm scared... But I can do it, nya!)
Chaaaarge!
Graaagh!
Uwah?!
All right, I cut off its tail! How's it looking for you, kitty? Uh, what the...?
*pant* *pant* Mrooow...
Kitty?! No!
Crap! I need to take out this stupid monster right now!
Damn you! Daaaamn yooooou!
Well, we made it back in one piece. Not sure how that happened, but hey!
Look, I'm sorry about today. It's my fault. I didn't think about what I was asking you to do, and you ended up being hurt.
No. It was me who messed up. I'm the one who was weak.
You entrusted me with a key role, and I made a purr-fect mess of it.
And on top of that, you got hurt trying to purr-tect me, nya!
I'm a failure as a fur-iend.
No, it's my fault! I just didn't know your strengths, is all!
Purr-lease. I just...want to be alone.
Huh? Kitty, wait!
Geez, I really thought we were starting to understand each other, but now...
Is it all happening again? Just like last time?
Am I going to lose someone important to me AGAIN?
Kitty's gone, and I'm all alone. Just like last time...
A few years ago, in the arena where Vanessa grew up...
Heya, Liam! How'd the match go?
Oh, Vanessa. I...
Bwa ha ha! Am I seein' things here? Is a lion-ranked fighter associating with a TRAINEE? Better be careful, lion, or his weakness will spread to you!
Cram it, sister! I'll talk to who I want! ...Wait, Liam? Are you crying AGAIN?
*sniff* M-my match went okay somehow, but only thanks to luck. I...I don't know how much longer I can keep this up!
The fact that a trainee like me is even alive is already a miracle. So it's like that woman said—you should leave me before I end up making you weak.
That's bunk and you know it! Besides, you and me are stray dogs, so it doesn't matter who we hang out with.
Death sneaks up on everybody and clocks 'em over the head, so there's no sense spending all your time worrying about when it's gonna happen!
If you say so...
But in the arena, the strong eat the weak. Those who are weak either become strong, or they no longer become anything at all.
Soon, the time for the test was upon them.
Liam, you pathetic lump'a wasted space! I've got half a mind to shunt you off to the mines! 'Least there you might be able to do somethin' useful for once!
N-no! If you force me away from here, I'd have nowhere else to go...
You just run back'n forth and somehow manage not to get killed in the process. There ain't no value in a fighter like that!
Eep!
Hold up, boss! Sure, he might be a little on the skittish side, but what if me and him hooked up as a tag team?
Two fighters taking on a huge fiend would be one hell of a show, eh? Ehhhhh?
This is it, Liam! Win this, and you stay. Remember, I've got your back! You can do this!
Y-yeah...
Hell, this is freakin' POINTLESS! Still, I suppose folks might enjoy watchin' the two of ya get eaten, so it's your funeral. ...I ain't payin' for a funeral, by the way.
Graaargh!
N-no! I can't! This is too much for me!
What, this? This guy's a puppydog! Just follow my lead and we've got this thing in the bag!
I...I don't think I can... N-no! I have to!
Vanessa gave me this one chance, and I won't let her down! Haaaaah!
HURK!
L-Liam? LIAAAAAAMM!
Bwa ha ha! Saw that comin' a mile away. What else'd ya expect, throwin' some fool weakling against a fiend like that?
What happened to Liam that day was my fault, and it left a dark stain on my heart. But it also taught me something...
If I associate with weak people, they will always drag me down to their level. It's inevitable. That's why I'm always seeking out the strongest people I can possibly find.
I don't even know HOW to associate with weaker people anymore. And yet...
Kitty's still gone? *sigh* Is there nothing I can do?
I wish we could go back to the way it was before—when we were still getting along. But if I were to be overprotective or ask her to do too much again...
Yeah, this is all a bit over my head. Maybe I should ask someone a little closer to her and see what they think.
I bet someone from the Soaratorium will know what to do!
...Wow, that's quite the story there. So basically, because of all that, you wanna know about Felynes?
Yes! Tell me everything! I mean, your world is lousy with 'em, right?
Well, in terms of general traits, most Felynes are loyal, obedient, and have a strong sense of camaraderie.
Okay, good. So how do I deal with 'em?
That's...not an easy answer.
Oh, come on! You know all about their race and traits and whatever!
Yes, but not every Felyne is the same, just like all humans are different.
Agreed! If you wish to work with a specific Felyne—or even just be friends—you must sort out your differences one-on-one, just as you would with anyone else.
You gotta fight for the right to be buds!
My brain hurts...
...And now, after all that, you have decided to seek my counsel?
Yeah. I mean, we get along despite the fact I'm weaker than you, so how do you do it? How can you even stand being around a pathetic lump like me?
First of all, I would never think of you in such a way. Your weakness or strength is, frankly, irrelevant to our friendship.
I...don't get it?
Then allow me a different approach: Why are you going so far to keep your Felyne friend around in the first place?
Because she's important.
Important how? Because she is a Lynian? If such is the case, your problem can be solved by simply befriending a new Lynian.
Hmmm...
This is new, but...sure! Why not? Let's be fur-iends.
It's a purr-fectly happy thought, Vanessa. Thank you, nya!
After all, what kind of Palico would I be if I let you do everything!
No. I don't want to be friends with any old Lynian—I want to be friends with HER.
No one can replace her. She is my one and only Lynian in this or any world!
There you have it... What you feel at this moment is what's important—not whether she is weak or strong.
Oh geez, I had this all wrong...
All I've been thinking about is strength. But she's so much more to me...
Vanessa! We've got a problem!
What's wrong?
Your Felyne friend ran off into the Hoary Woods by herself!
What? She'll be killed on her own!
I need to go save her!
Hoary Woods
*huff* *wheeze* Well, I'm deep in the woods nyow. What a trial this has been!
But I managed to purr-ocure the eggs I needed, so all I have to do is get back to base and fry up some goodness!
Graaaargh!
Mrow! I knew something would show up!
Oh, this is a cat-astrophe!
I COULD leave the eggs and run for it...
But then I won't be able to make a tasty dish for Vanessa!
Raoorgh!
Augh! It's curtains for me-ow!
Mrow? What happened?
There you are, kitty! Oh, I was so worried! Are you okay?! Are you hurt?!
Vanessa?! Why are you here?
Fight first, talk later! Hraaaagh!
Y-you saved me again...
I'm very glad you're all right, but why did you run off and do something so reckless?
If something had happened to you, I'd...
'Cause I wanted to show you how I feel.
You what?
I was going to make you a special meal to apaw-logize for all the trouble I caused.
I went to the Hoary Woods to look for eggs, but that ended up making even MORE trouble! Oh, I'm a compurr-lete loser...
Look, you don't have to do anything special for me. I'll always... I mean...
Ugh! Fine. I'm gonna have to tell you how I feel or else you'll never know.
Since I understand your feelings now, it's my turn to share mine.
After you left, all I could think about was how to get along with someone who isn't as strong as me.
But then I realized something: none of that matters.
What DOES matter is getting to really know the person you're thinking about.
So I sat down and tried super hard to think about who you actually are, kitty. Wanna hear what I came up with?
Lay it on me-ow!
Well, to start with, you're SUPER adorable. It makes my heart go pitty-pat whenever I look at you.
You're also kind, dependable with the cart, and dedicated. Oh, and a GREAT cook!
But most of all, you're just a good cat. You went to a whole lot of trouble for me, and there's no one else like you in this or any other world!
That's why I care about you so much, and why I want you as my friend!
You really care that much?
...Give me your hand, nya.
Huh? Sure, but wh—WUUUUUH?!
We're shaking hands. Hands and paws! Know why it feels so warm? Because I'm happy!
You are? Why?
Because I know purr-lenty about what makes you great, which is why I want to be your friend!
And since you feel the same way, it makes me wanna purr all day!
Wait, so you mean...
Yep! Let's be fur-iends forever!
Done and done!
It's purr-fectly plated, too.
Sorry for the wait, everybody, but the main course is here in all its eggy glory!
We worked our tails off to make this, so make sure you eat lots!
Well, this smells a treat! Was it perhaps made from eggs gathered from the giant birds in the depths of the Hoary Woods?
Correctamundo! That's quite the purr-ceptive eye you've got there.
Well then, I shall savor the chance to enjoy the fruits of your friendship.
Oh boy, I've been waiting for this all day. Let's dig in!
Elisanne! Over here!
Hello, Vanessa. I'm pleased the two of you seem to have patched things up.
And it's thanks to you, so I want you to enjoy some of this chow!
I would be glad to share in your meal. What exactly are we celebrating, though?
Oh, I think it's pretty obvious...
Purr-fectly obvious...
We're celebrating the two of us becoming best friends!
